name: Free Runner Demo By Matthew Woodcock
name_original: Free Runner Demo By Matthew Woodcock
description:
This is a Parkour Game Demo with about 1/6 of the final projects features. 

Mouse to look around

WASD movement as well as arrow keys

SpaceBar to Jump

More features will be added!

-PS Copyright 2020 "Free Runner" and all of its  assets

This is meant for web, works on app.  I will make sure to respond to all comments with feedback and more!
